title: VuPoint Solutions Magic Wand Portable Scanner
transcripts:
VuPoint Solutions® Magic Wand Portable Scanner

Portable scanner lets you easily scan your documents, photos, newspaper articles, magazine articles, letters or any reading  Magic Wanddocuments and save them on a Micro SD card. It can scan high resolution images in color and in monochrome, and it's a great way to turn stacks of documents into organized digital files. It features a Contact Image Sensor, scanning status LCD display and Optical Character Recognition software. Choose between 300 x 300 dpi for standard resolution and 600 x 600 dpi for high resolution. Scan speed is only 13 seconds for high resolution with color and 3 for standard with color. Supports Micro SD card up to 32GB (card not included). Compatible with Windows® XP SP2, Windows® Vista, Mac OS® 10.4 or above. Includes USB cable, software and carrying pouch. Uses the included 2 AA batteries. Model # PDS-ST410-VP

How many times have you needed a copy of something right then and right there, but there was no scanner in sight? Now, you can always have your scanner right with you with the Magic Wand from VuPoint.

It doesn't matter what you need to scan or where it is. The Magic Wand is portable. So, if you wanted to scan a copy of a floor or a wall paper pattern to compare it to your home improvement store, you can.

If you need a copy of a recipe while visiting a friend, now you can scan and copy it directly from the recipe book or card.

How many times have you wanted a copy of a photograph from a relative or from an event, but you could not take it home with you to scan? Now, with the Magic Wand, you can scan and save any photograph right where you are.

It's simple and easy to use. You insert a microSD card in it for the memory, select your resolution, and simply roll the scanner over the item. You then can hook the unit up to your computer to save, print, or email the image.

From documents, to photographs, to designer patterns, your Magic Wand from VuPoint will not only save you time, but money.
